analysis.description:
SimpleBanners.takeBanner (/unique_chucks/26/0xb60cfc056a3f201ce4f421655d5fcb535b8d7ca5.sol#22-57) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(totalCost) (/unique_chucks/26/0xb60cfc056a3f201ce4f421655d5fcb535b8d7ca5.sol#46)

SimpleBanners.calculateTotalCost (/unique_chucks/26/0xb60cfc056a3f201ce4f421655d5fcb535b8d7ca5.sol#100-113) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- totalCost > banners[bannerId].balance (/unique_chucks/26/0xb60cfc056a3f201ce4f421655d5fcb535b8d7ca5.sol#108-111)
